Submodules¶

src.main module¶

Module used as entry point in command-line application. Contains the main function that sets up the environment based on arguments and their mappings as internal objects. Throws error in case of invalid args.

src.main.main()[source]¶

Obtains sys args and runs sync algorithm on the corresponding file managers.

Raises¶

ValidationException

If arguments provided were not respecting enstablished format
